text: 16:27 Onger Akaba 62:12; Aghuzir Akaba 24:12; Sekaraia 14:5; Matyu 25:31; 26:64; Mak 8:38; Luk 9:26; Rom 2:6; 1 Pita 1:17; Akar Mogomem 22:12Guizbangɨra, Gumazamizibar Otarim uan enselba ko, uan Afeziamɨn angazangarir ekiam sara izam. Egh dughiar kamɨn ivezim isɨ gumazamiziba vaghvagh men araziba bagh me danɨngam.
